subject: Re: 回复：Re: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

What is the update of this matter ? When can I receive the missing parts ?

Please follow up. I will start warning the online sim racing community about this.


________________________________
From: Pandu Wirawan <pandu.wirawan@outlook.com>
Sent: Monday, May 26, 2025 8:29:31 AM
To: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: 回复：Re: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed

Good morning,

I have not back from you since last week. Please update me on the shipment of the missing parts.

Thank you

________________________________
From: Pandu Wirawan <pandu.wirawan@outlook.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2025 8:43:06 AM
To: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: 回复：Re: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed


Hi good morning,

Have you managed to ship the missing parts ? Please share the tracking number.

Thank you
________________________________
From: Pandu Wirawan <pnd001@outlook.com>
Sent: Monday, May 19, 2025 6:02:48 AM
To: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: 回复：Re: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed

Please remember to send all the required spacers and nuts/bolts (see attached). Please let me know when  they have been sent.




Thank you



________________________________
From: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Monday, May 19, 2025 5:35:24 AM
To: Pandu Wirawan <pnd001@outlook.com>
Subject: 回复：Re: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed


Sorry, we'll look into it for you and arrange a replacement as soon as we can.


Pandu Wirawan<pnd001@outlook.com> 在 2025年5月18日 周日 21:40 写道：
Good afternoon,

I have received the item but the heel plate is missing. I paid for the base plate option and from the product page, it comes with the heel plate as well. Please send the heel plate as soon as possible.

Shipment picture and product page are attached.

________________________________
From: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 13, 2025 4:42:53 AM
To: Pandu Wirawan <pnd001@outlook.com>
Subject: 回复：Re: Order #SSN1467 confirmed

Okay, we've changed it for you.


Pandu Wirawan<pnd001@outlook.com> 在 2025年5月13日 周二 3:13 写道：
Good evening,

Aramco Compound
Dhahran 34471
Saudi Arabia


Kindly deliver the order to the address stated above.

Thank you.



________________________________

conversations.body_text: Hi Pandu Wirawan,  We will follow up immediately — it seems the warehouse staff may have missed the reshipment. I’ll look into it right away and get back to you shortly with the tracking number.
你好，Pandu Wirawan，  你能拍一下收到的商品吗？由于底座由三部分组成——主底板、碳纤维支撑板和限位板——我担心更换件时可能会出错，所以想确认一下。
你好，Pandu Wirawan，  ​   替换品已发送，但我们仍需要您提供照片以供确认。  YT2515700707002662   https://www.yunexpress.com/.

I have received the base plate. Picture is attached. Thank you.

________________________________
